item.title: simulating meta-analysis data
item.description: # packages library(tidyverse) # set a seed so these results are reproducible set.seed(38) Write a purrr::rerun simulation So, I suppose we want to create a meta-analysis. We need to take two samplesâ€¦ Try it with the single-study setting first In this case we wish to produce trials worth of samples. Calculate the confidence intervals. The function # sketch the function first # this will go to purrr::rerun trials = 10 # number of replications # things i'd like to compare over simulations n = 30 # sample size # i'm not sure about this whole evaluation thing.
